seriesJson.title: Public Broadcasting Act of 1967
seriesJson.description: A panel discussion on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967. Moderated by Edgar Willis, former program associate for National Educational Television. Panelists: Edwin Burrows; Ben Yablonki; and William Pearce.

node.title: Panel discussion, part two
node.description: This program presents the second part of a panel discussion on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.

node.title: Panel discussion, part one
node.description: This program presents the first part of a panel discussion on the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.
